verses.verse: Judge <WG2919> not<WG3361>, that<WG2443> ye be<WG2919> not<WG3361> judged<WG2919>.

For <WG1063> with<WG1722> what<WG3739> judgment<WG2917> ye judge<WG2919>, ye shall be judged<WG2919>: and<WG2532> with<WG1722> what<WG3739> measure<WG3358> ye mete<WG3354>, it shall be measured<WG488> unto<WG488> you<WG5213>.

And <WG1161> why<WG5101> beholdest thou<WG991> the mote<WG2595> that is<WG3588> in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80>'s eye<WG3788>, but<WG1161> considerest<WG2657> not<WG3756> the beam<WG1385> that is in<WG1722> thine own<WG4674> eye<WG3788>?

Or <WG2228> how<WG4459> wilt thou say<WG2046> to<WG80> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80>, Let<WG863> me cast out<WG1544> the mote<WG2595> out<WG575> of<WG3788> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788>; and<WG2532> lo<WG2400>, the beam<WG1385> is in<WG1722> thine own<WG4675> eye<WG3788>?

Thou hypocrite<WG5273>, cast out<WG1537> first<WG4412> the beam<WG1385> out<WG1537> of<WG3788> thine own<WG4675> eye<WG3788>; and<WG2532> then<WG5119> shalt thou see clearly<WG1227> to cast out<WG1544> the mote<WG2595> out<WG1537> of<WG3788> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80>'s eye<WG3788>.

Give <WG1325> not<WG3361> that which is holy<WG40> unto the dogs<WG2965>, neither<WG3366> cast your<WG5216> pearls<WG3135> before<WG1715> the swine<WG5519>, lest<WG3379> haply they trample<WG2662> them<WG846> under<WG1722> their<WG846> feet<WG4228>, and<WG4762> turn and<WG4762> rend<WG4486> you<WG5209>.
Ask <WG154>, and<WG2532> it shall be given<WG1325> you<WG5213>; seek<WG2212>, and<WG2532> ye shall find<WG2147>; knock<WG2925>, and<WG2532> it shall be opened<WG455> unto you<WG5213>:
for <WG1063> every<WG3956> one that asketh<WG154> receiveth<WG2983>; and<WG2532> he that seeketh<WG2212> findeth<WG2147>; and<WG2532> to him that knocketh<WG2925> it shall be opened<WG455>.

Or <WG2228> what<WG5101> man<WG444> is there<WG2076> of<WG1537> you<WG5216>, who<WG1437>, if his<WG846> son<WG5207> shall ask<WG154> him<WG846> for a<WG3361> loaf<WG1929>, will give him<WG846> a<WG3361> stone<WG3037>;
or <WG2532> if<WG1437> he shall ask<WG154> for a fish<WG2486>, will give<WG1929> him<WG846> a<WG3361> serpent<WG3789>?

If <WG1487> ye<WG5210> then<WG3767>, being<WG5607> evil<WG4190>, know how<WG1492> to give<WG1325> good<WG18> gifts<WG1390> unto<WG5043> your<WG5216> children<WG5043>, how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> shall<WG1325> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> give<WG1325> good things<WG18> to them that<WG3588> ask<WG154> him<WG846>?

All things<WG3956> therefore<WG3767> whatsoever<WG3745> ye would<WG2309> that<WG2443> men<WG444> should do<WG4160> unto you<WG5213>, even<WG3779> so<WG2532> do<WG4160> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> unto them<WG846>: for<WG1063> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the law<WG3551> and<WG2532> the prophets<WG4396>.

Enter ye<WG1525> in by<WG1223> the narrow gate<WG4439>: for<WG3754> wide<WG4116> is the gate<WG4439>, and<WG2532> broad<WG2149> is the way<WG3598>, that leadeth<WG520> to<WG1519> destruction<WG684>, and<WG2532> many<WG4183> are<WG1526> they that enter<WG1525> in<WG1223> thereby<WG846>.

For <WG3754> narrow<WG2346> is the gate<WG4439>, and<WG2532> straitened<WG2346> the way<WG3598>, that leadeth<WG520> unto<WG1519> life<WG2222>, and<WG2532> few<WG3641> are<WG1526> they that find<WG2147> it<WG846>.

Beware <WG4337> of<WG575> false prophets<WG5578>, who<WG3748> come<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> sheep<WG4263>'s clothing<WG1742>, but<WG1161> inwardly<WG2081> are<WG1526> ravening<WG727> wolves<WG3074>.
By <WG575> their<WG846> fruits<WG2590> ye shall know<WG1921> them<WG846>. Do<WG3385> men gather<WG4816> grapes<WG4718> of<WG575> thorns<WG173>, or<WG2228> figs<WG4810> of<WG575> thistles<WG5146>?

Even so<WG3779> every<WG3956> good<WG18> tree<WG1186> bringeth forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590>; but<WG1161> the corrupt<WG4550> tree<WG1186> bringeth forth<WG4160> evil<WG4190> fruit<WG2590>.
A good<WG18> tree<WG1186> cannot<WG1410> bring forth<WG4160> evil<WG4190> fruit<WG2590>, neither<WG3761> can a corrupt<WG4550> tree<WG1186> bring forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590>.
Every <WG3956> tree<WG1186> that bringeth<WG4160> not<WG3361> forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590> is hewn down<WG1581>, and<WG2532> cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the fire<WG4442>.
Therefore <WG686> by<WG575> their<WG846> fruits<WG2590> ye shall know<WG1921> them<WG846>.

Not <WG3756> every<WG3956> one that saith<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Lord<WG2962>, Lord<WG2962>, shall enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772>; but<WG235> he that doeth<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of my<WG3450> Father<WG3962> who is in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

Many <WG4183> will say<WG2046> to me<WG3427> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day<WG2250>, Lord<WG2962>, Lord<WG2962>, did we<WG4395> not<WG3756> prophesy<WG4395> by<WG3686> thy<WG4674> name<WG3686>, and<WG2532> by<WG3686> thy<WG4674> name<WG3686> cast out<WG1544> demons<WG1140>, and<WG2532> by<WG3686> thy<WG4674> name<WG3686> do<WG4160> many<WG4183> mighty works<WG1411>?
And <WG2532> then<WG5119> will I profess<WG3670> unto them<WG3754>, I<WG1097> never<WG3763> knew<WG1097> you<WG5209>: depart<WG672> from<WG575> me<WG1700>, ye that work<WG2038> iniquity<WG458>.

Every <WG3956> one<WG3748> therefore<WG3767> that heareth<WG191> these<WG5128> words<WG3056> of mine<WG3450>, and<WG2532> doeth<WG4160> them<WG846>, shall be<WG846> likened<WG3666> unto a<WG435> wise<WG5429> man<WG435>, who<WG3748> built<WG3618> his<WG846> house<WG3614> upon<WG1909> the rock<WG4073>:

and <WG2532> the rain<WG1028> descended<WG2597>, and<WG2532> the floods<WG4215> came<WG2064>, and<WG2532> the winds<WG417> blew<WG4154>, and<WG2532> beat upon<WG4363> that<WG1565> house<WG3614>; and<WG2532> if fell<WG4098> not<WG3756>: for<WG1063> it was founded<WG2311> upon<WG1909> the rock<WG4073>.

And <WG2532> every<WG3956> one that heareth<WG191> these<WG5128> words<WG3056> of mine<WG3450>, and<WG2532> doeth<WG4160> them<WG846> not<WG3361>, shall be likened<WG3666> unto a<WG435> foolish<WG3474> man<WG435>, who<WG3748> built<WG3618> his<WG846> house<WG3614> upon<WG1909> the sand<WG285>:

and <WG2532> the rain<WG1028> descended<WG2597>, and<WG2532> the floods<WG4215> came<WG2064>, and<WG2532> the winds<WG417> blew<WG4154>, and<WG2532> smote upon<WG4350> that<WG1565> house<WG3614>; and<WG2532> it fell<WG4098>: and<WG2532> great<WG3173> was<WG2258> the fall<WG4431> thereof<WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG4931> these<WG5128> words<WG3056>, the multitudes<WG3793> were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> teaching<WG1322>:
for <WG1063> he<WG2258> taught<WG1321> them<WG846> as<WG5613> one having<WG2192> authority<WG1849>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> as<WG5613> their scribes<WG1122>.
